inclusion.criterion: more than 48 hours of mechanical ventilation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: accepting to be called back 3-month and on one year after discharge of ICU.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: chronic cognitive deterioration before ICU admission
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: 41-year-old man with Acromegaly, underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. Lab studies show IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN and random GH level is 4 ug/L.
